医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
华大基因报告：泰国需采取紧急行动抗击宫颈癌根据玛希隆大学 (Mahidol University) 发表的一项研究，只有 28.5% 的泰国女性在存活率最高的第一期被诊断出宫颈癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/BGI-Genomics-report-Thailand-needs-to-take-urgent-action-to-combat-cervical-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/BGI-Genomics-report-Thailand-needs-to-take-urgent-action-to-combat-cervical-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70df08f3-5ea3-453c-a120-4cbc69eba574 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 22:32:18 -0400 BGI Genomics report: Thailand needs to take urgent action to combat cervical cancer
鉴定出两种新的 HPV+ 头颈癌亚型在美国，与人乳头瘤病毒 (HPV) 相关的头颈部癌症，即头颈鳞状细胞癌 (HNSCC) 病例正在迅速增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Two-new-subtypes-of-HPV2b-head-and-neck-cancers-identified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Two-new-subtypes-of-HPV2b-head-and-neck-cancers-identified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d19b727-ffb3-4a3f-9225-dacf818933d2 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 22:27:54 -0400 Two new subtypes of HPV+ head and neck cancers identified
单克隆抗体有望减缓 ALS 的进展新的研究表明，一种已经在某些癌症中进行过测试的单克隆抗体可能是一种有前途的治疗方法，可以阻止肌萎缩侧索硬化症（ALS）（一种致命的神经退行性疾病）的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Monoclonal-antibody-shows-promise-in-slowing-progression-of-ALS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Monoclonal-antibody-shows-promise-in-slowing-progression-of-ALS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42fe6c0f-7d27-4f76-9aa4-15b25904fc75 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 22:23:43 -0400 Monoclonal antibody shows promise in slowing progression of ALS
较高的植物蛋白摄入量与较低的慢性肾病风险相关植物性饮食具有多种健康益处，包括降低心血管疾病和某些癌症的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Higher-plant- Protein-intake-linked-to-lower-risk-of-chronic-kidney-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Higher-plant- Protein-intake-linked-to-lower-risk-of-chronic-kidney-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53cce0c4-6121-47f4-82c9-1931f07ee3bd Mon, 31 Jul 2023 22:22:25 -0400 Higher plant protein intake linked to lower risk of chronic kidney disease
研究发现，记忆事件时大脑中的θ振荡更为普遍神经元在大脑中产生有节律的电活动模式。神经科学领域尚未解决的问题之一是驱动这些节律信号（称为振荡）的主要因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Theta-oscillations-more-prevalent-in-the-brain-when-remembering-events-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Theta-oscillations-more-prevalent-in-the-brain-when-remembering-events-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bbc03bb3-66ed-42b4-88f3-dc5b81848085 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 21:19:07 -0400 Theta oscillations more prevalent in the brain when remembering events, study finds
COVID-19 导致有神经发育疾病儿童的家庭更加焦虑《全球健康杂志》上发表的一项同行评审研究分析了 6,600 多个有神经发育疾病 (NDC) 儿童的家庭的数据，这些儿童患有自闭症、注意力缺陷/多动障碍、发育性语言障碍、唐氏综合症、威廉姆斯综合症、和智力障碍——来自 70 个国家，包括美国。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/COVID-19-led-to-increased-anxiety-for-families-with-children-with-neurodevelopmental-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/COVID-19-led-to-increased-anxiety-for-families-with-children-with-neurodevelopmental-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa5d8454-16cb-49c2-86c3-f3ba661df27e Mon, 31 Jul 2023 21:14:30 -0400 COVID-19 led to increased anxiety for families with children with neurodevelopmental conditions
精子包装蛋白可能是男性不育的关键精子在新生命的创造中发挥着关键作用，基本上提供了所需遗传物质的一半。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Sperm-packaging- Proteins-may-hold-key-to-male-infertility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Sperm-packaging- Proteins-may-hold-key-to-male-infertility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e45768e-beba-4615-94a3-6addd8a4aa38 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 20:49:58 -0400 Sperm packaging proteins may hold key to male infertility
人类衰老成纤维细胞引发免疫缺陷小鼠肺部纤维化反应一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》杂志（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”，Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 15 卷第 14 期封面上，题为“Human senescent filblasts trigger Progressive小鼠肺纤维化。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Human-senescent-filamental-reaction-in-the-lungs-of-immunodeficient-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Human-senescent-太多成纤维细胞-触发纤维发生-反应-in-the-lungs-of-immunodeficient-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f5c788e-ac7c-4935-8afb-b7b402fa2e00 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 20:45:05 -0400 Human senescent fibroblasts trigger fibrogenic reaction in the lungs of immunodeficient mice
AI 语言模型 GPT-3 在类比推理方面的表现与大学本科生相当人们无需任何特殊的培训或实践，就可以通过将新问题与熟悉的问题进行比较并将解决方案扩展到新问题来轻松解决新问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/AI-language-model-GPT-3-performs-about-as-well-as-college-undergraduates-in-anaological-reasoning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/AI-language-model-GPT-3-performs-about-as-well-as-college-undergraduates-in-anaological-reasoning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4f0293c-e0e4-46c4-8aa5-a5e2052a6b4c Mon, 31 Jul 2023 20:38:49 -0400 AI language model GPT-3 performs about as well as college undergraduates in analogical reasoning
研究发现，囊性纤维化的晚期诊断会导致长期健康结果较差《儿科杂志》发表了科罗拉多州儿童医院肺部专家、科罗拉多大学儿科副教授 Stacey Martiniano 医学博士的手稿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Late-diagnosis-of-cystic-Fiberosis-leads-to-poorer-long-term-health-outcomes-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Late-diagnosis-of-cystic-fibrosis-leads-to-poorer-long-term-health-outcomes-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f55b6b0-fcd3-4fad-9b5a-2a2c7ab1d4b8 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 20:27:06 -0400 Late diagnosis of cystic fibrosis leads to poorer long-term health outcomes, study finds
